official_title: A bill to clarify the applicability of the Federal Tort Claims Act to claims arising in the Northern Mariana Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Declares that the Northern Mariana Islands shall not be considered a foreign country for purposes of the tort claims procedure provisions of the Federal Tort Claims Act. Directs that this Act shall expire upon the establishment of the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the applicability of the Federal Tort Claims Act to claims arising in the Northern Mariana Islands.
